title.rendered: “Updates on IDF Casualties and Wounded Soldiers: Insights from the Frontline in Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
The attached link contains a message from an IDF spokesperson concerning the name of an IDF casualty, which has been conveyed to his family:
https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC130120241898493420

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where the details and photographs of the fallen soldiers are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

Also, a reservist officer from Battalion 7155, the “Spearhead” Brigade (55), was severely wounded yesterday (Friday) in combat in the south of the Gaza Strip.

In addition, a reserve soldier from the “Foxes of the Heights” Brigade (646) and an officer from the Engineering Battalion 605, “Barak” Brigade (188), were severely injured the day before yesterday (Thursday) in various battles in the central Gaza Strip.

The wounded soldiers were taken for medical treatment in the hospital, their families were updated.
